header_sub.label: What I am:
header_sub.text: I'm a product designer based in San Francisco specializing in digital product strategy and interaction.
header_sub.purpose: The type of designer I am and where I'm located.

productCycle.label: Where I typically fit into the product cycle:
productCycle.text: I'm typically involved end-to-end, usually at the beginning of the process, in research cycles or even business development, then see the product through design, implementation, and retrospective assessment. I see my role as holistic and often the glue between the other contributors.

indivContrib.label: Management vs production:
indivContrib.text: I prefer being a senior/lead/principal-level individual contributor, often leading product vision or project initiatives.

companySize.label: The size of team/company I prefer:
companySize.text: It depends. The size of the company doesn't matter as much as the team size. Because I tend to be end-to-end, I tend to work on early-stage initiatives where a lot of the answers haven't been figured out yet and the product vision is still maturing.
